page.title: 01 GREAT MALVERN
page.content: Malvern combines the old and the new, the oldest{HILLS}in England,some of the newest technology in{R.S.R.E..} The town centre is dominated by the magnificent{PRIORY}now celebrating its 900th anniversary. A small museum of local history can be found in the nearby{ABBEY GATEWAY.} Long famous for its{waters}and{Elgar} connections the towns now hosts two well-known events; its annual{FESTIVAL and{THREE COUNTIES SHOW,}held in June. Unusally for a small town(pop.30 000) Malvern has its own theatre,{THE {FESTIVAL THEATRE,}which along with{THE {WINTER GARDENS}and a cinema form an entertainment complex. Adjoining this is{PRIORY PARK}with its Victorian{ {BANDSTAND}and Great Malvern's only public sports facility, an{open-air {swimming pool.
